title: 英國外相: 與「中國」的關係將會改變

replies.msg:
英國外相Dominic Raab:

中國很好地協助英國抗疫.  
但疫情過後, 英中關係將不會像以前那麼樣.  需要大力調查疫情起因.

https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-04-16/no-business-as-usual-with-china-after-coronavirus-u-k-says?utm_content=business&utm_medium=social&cmpid=socialflow-twitter-business&utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=socialflow-organic


No ‘Business As Usual’ With China After Covid-19, U.K. Says
By Kitty Donaldson
and Joe Mayes
April 17, 2020, 1:17 AM GMT+8 Updated on April 17, 2020, 2:07 AM GMT+8

Raab says ‘deep dive’ into coronavirus outbreak will be needed
Foreign secretary still welcomes China cooperation on supplies


U.K. Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab said it could no longer be “business as usual” with China when the coronavirus pandemic is over, the latest sign of hardening attitudes toward Beijing as the crisis drags on.

“There absolutely needs to be a very, very deep dive after the event and review of the lessons, including of the outbreak of the virus,” Raab said at a press conference in London on Thursday. “I don’t think we can flinch from that at all.”

Raab, who is standing in for Boris Johnson as the prime minister recovers from Covid-19, said the U.K. has seen good cooperation from China, both in terms of the repatriation of British nationals from Wuhan and in terms of medical supplies during the pandemic. But he said there were “hard questions” to be answered about how it started.

“There’s no doubt we can’t have business as usual after this crisis,” Raab said. “We’ll have to ask the hard questions about how it came about and how it could have been stopped earlier.”

讚成
我唔知譚仔嘅功能，好似主要係提供指引。

但佢地提供嘅指引根本刻意保留，同時間大家各自掌握到隻病毒嘅資料，而全世界嘅預防嘅共識係lockdown。

咁真係無需要再比錢，反正譚仔之後都係會再奶共，會費用黎研究藥好過。

呢次病菌戰成功攻破西方嘅軍事保護直達心臟。理論上呢 D 嘢只可以做一次同一定要攞命。家下西方無真係佢想像中冧咗反而更清楚依賴中國嘅後果。

中國唔係對世界無貢獻，起碼叫醒咗好多人明白要再進步：遙距工作，國民基本收入，生產線，生物危機，人口流動，大陣亡處理，機械化加智能社會。

Home Affairs Minister Peter Dutton says the coronavirus crisis will lead to a "reset about the way in which the world interacts with China".

Appearing on Nine's Today this morning, Mr Dutton was asked about reports overnight that US intelligence now believes the virus escaped from a Chinese lab – something not long ago widely dismissed as a "conspiracy theory".

"The US is saying they've got documentation which demonstrates that the virus had a particular path or origin," Mr Dutton said, adding that he hadn't personally seen the evidence.

"I think they'll detail all of that information but I do think there will be a reset about the way in which the world interacts with China. We do want more transparency."

Mr Dutton said while it was a "wonderful thing" that China could grow its economy and lift its people out of poverty, "when you've got a Communist Party that doesn't have the transparency other comparable economies have, that is a problem".

"When you see their involvement in foreign interference and cyber (attacks), all of these aspects need to be looked at again," he said.

"I think is a good thing that there's transparency and that hopefully you can have China answering these questions that are reasonably put and people can have more confidence."

Mr Dutton said there had been more than 60 Australians who had died and "every one of those cases involves a tragedy of somebody very close to you being lost".

"All of those families would demand answers and transparency, I don't think it's too much to ask. It would certainly be demanded of us if Australia was at the epicentre of this virus making its way into society," he said.

"So I think it is incumbent upon China to answer those questions and provide the information so that people can have clarity about exactly what happened."

唔知你係咪97後，但係希望你明白英國自開埠起將自由、普通法、三權分立引入香港，麥理浩時期設立廉政公署，以及推行九年免費教育，以及十年建屋計劃等德政， 彭定康時期頂住支那壓力推動政制改革，實行地區直選。

一句講曬，冇英國就唔會有香港，亦唔會有我哋今日嘅美好生活，更唔會有呢一場運動

我哋正正就係要捍衛英國留畀我哋嘅呢一堆 寶貴遺產：自由、法治、公義、透明、廉潔

而且連登一向錯曬風向，英國點日落都好，都係重要持分者，必須engage。
我地唔係要拉攏政府班奶共狗（例如Dominic Rabb），而係要拉攏英國民意啊。英國係民主國家，民意最重要。英國民意決定stand with Hong Kong/Boycott China，BJ以至成個政府都無得唔跟。

回應兩點
1.國際關係嘅利益大於感情，絕對無錯，香港人少才多人才多，有價值，所以我地嚮世界上有一定支持可以撐到今日。呢點好真，利益永遠行先。

2. 英國交還香港問題係無可奈何，因為香港根本無險可守。 香港唔似直布羅陀離英國近可以派運油船運水去支援，香港當年情況一斷水就收皮， 另一方面香港唔似福克蘭群島，隔離得個軍事好廢嘅阿根廷。 所以硬攻香港係難以實行。
解密檔案指出戴卓爾夫人當年有諗過只交還界限街以北，保留界限街以南，但奈何香港主要基建均在界限街以北，故此建議並不實際可行。
